Html:
I'm a little confused: there supposed to be an enhance and dk dll with Rawr 2.1, right? Both files/model are missing in the .zip archive.

And then there's a problem with Rawr.Cat. It values hit- and expertise rating with 0 even if you're below the cap.

This is fixed, just re-download v2.1.

We're working on the cat exp/hit bug.
